title: New: Formation – Hangin
body:
Having impressed at The Great Escape, as well as a set at BBC’s Big Weekend, London duo **Formation** return with their best track yet, in the form of _Hangin_.

Bridging the gap between festival favourite and indie dancefloor singalong, it’s further indication that Formation are one of the UK’s most exciting new artists. Check it out below.

Follow our [Spotify On Repeat playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
